text: Mark Holton (born April 2, 1958) is an American actor. His movies include Hoboken Hollow (2007), Gacy, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle (2000) and Little Giants (1994). Holton went to school at Northeastern State University in Tahlequah, Oklahoma. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Oklahoma
title: Mark Holton
